greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of Product_{k>=1} (1 + (k-1)*x^k).
link: Vaclav Kotesovec, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
mathematica: nmax = 50; poly = ConstantArray[0, nmax+1]; poly[[1]] = 1; poly[[2]] = 0; Do[Do[poly[[j+1]] += (k-1)*poly[[j-k+1]], {j, nmax, k, -1}];, {k, 2, nmax}]; poly
results.author: _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Jan 08 2016
